author: Yoda____
title: ah, this takes me back
review: I didn't actually buy this set but in my Junior school, our class had this set to play with when it was wet and nobody wanted to go outside. I never bothered duilding the outside but it was still really fun to play with and the passing system works well. Also 22 minifigures in one set is pretty awesome.

author: WiseWarrior
title: Great soccer set
review: While not as great as some of the newer soccer sets, this one is still a lot of fun. You have the springy players, which hold the ball quite well. It's a blast to play, but the ball occasionally gets stops rolling and you have to pick it up. But other than that it's a nice set.
